name: Community Garden (itch)
description:
Chill out in the clouds and dress up your floating greco-roman garden islands.

A chill atmospheric point and click game where you dress up your community garden with quirky ornaments and foliage. Nothing says relaxing like laying out pots on a bare patch of grass, or tucking a groovy cactus into it's new garden home, or even setting the framework of a legendary adventure.

Made in two days as part of the Guildford Game Jam, for the theme "community".

Credits:

- Art: Adam Coburn
- Art: Cam Hodge
- Music/SFX: Alyx Jones
- Code: Jon Kelliher
